description: Ron just got out of the Coast Guards boot camp and wanted to try the porn thing out. Dink gives a call in for a very special interview with Ron to congratulate him on being one of the first new faces that Claude is filming. Everyone is very excited to see what this tall stack of muscle is hiding underneath his clothes. He stands 6'4 and is from Northern California but visiting San Diego. He is very nervous but ready to watch some porn and show off his milky white body for the viewers.
title: Ron
